movie.title: X-Men
movie.writer: Tom DeSanto (story), Bryan Singer (story), David Hayter (screenplay)
movie.actors: Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Famke Janssen
movie.plot: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.
